segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar, he must really want those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for him to hand her some.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she's waiting for something really special.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel happy for them, even though they're being a bit sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over, but the boy seems determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how many cookies they think they can take before they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, so patient and eager, it's really sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, but I also hope they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, trying to reach the jar without falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, they seem pretty good at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks like she's done this a few times, she's just standing there waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their teamwork, even though they're being a bit naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR
